title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7025.3 - Outgoing prisoner packages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7025.3 - Outgoing prisoner packages

State Regulations
(a) Any items which a prisoner sends from a
facility shall be packaged in the presence of the prisoner and under the
supervision of facility staff. (b) The costs incurred in sending any outgoing prisoner packages shall be borne by
the prisoner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7025.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
